title: Yael Klass Articles | Similarweb
description: Yael is Similarweb's Director of Content. She is a passionate data-driven storyteller, and has strategized and launched many intl campaigns with viral impact
content: HomeBlogYael Klass VP of Corporate Marketing Yael Klass As VP of Corporate Marketing, Yael leads Similarweb's communication and creative division A passionate and data-driven storyteller, she has launched international campaigns with viral impact and strategized company-wide rebranding initiatives for start-ups. Yael is a regular contributor to Forbes and Search Engine Journal and teaches ​​Marketing Practicum courses at Reichman University. Yael builds all-star teams that directly impact business objectives and inspire loyal readership and exponential growth. Prior to her 10+ years in SaaS, she traveled the world as an art educator and producer, devising community development efforts for at-risk populations. Yael received a BFA from New York University Tisch School of the Arts and a post-secondary degree from Shenkar College of Engineering and Design.
